articles.description: Not only has it been lavished with £100k of TLC, this Monza GSE also comes with a Carlton GSi 3000 24v motor
articles.content: There are cars that you want, and then there are a few, rare models that you want, want. A want that seems to arise from deep within your soul and takes over your whole being. A sort of primeval want… [+4190 chars]
